name: Prover Technology AB
goal: Prover Technology provides software solutions for signaling design automation that radically reduce time-to-market for commissioning of railway signaling control systems, with improved safety. The company's goals are to help its customers to achieve cost savings in signalling system life-cycle (LCC), iimprove interoperability and reliability and shortening time-to-market of signaling system products.
euInitiatives: The Shift2Rail JU, contributing to smart and sustainable growth through actions to foster research and innovation in the railway sector.
